acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Honorable Robert Smith Simpson, Annandale, Virginia, gave these papers to the Library on May 7, 1992, through Kenneth Jensen, Acquisitions Department.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of former diplomat R. Smith Simpson (1906- ) contains ca. 225 items (3 Hollinger boxes), 1918-1991, consisting of Christmas letters, bound printed material concerning the activities and writings of Simpson, an oral history interview with Simpson, and committee records, including newsletters, memoranda, and minutes of the Committee for the Study of Diplomacy.
